room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Escape game was pretty awesome! The playground room was colorful with lots of puzzles that were challenging and rewarding to solve. very fun with a group of friends. highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I played Special ops and playground and they were the best games Iâ€™ve ever done! Really immersive and really felt like I was there! And I got out of both! Definitely go check them out!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This is a must do while in the Battery Park area. By far a fun and unique experience. We had a group of 8 ranging from ages 7-48, the entire group participated and had a ball. This place is run extremely well, the staff is so helpful, intelligent, and eager to make your experience a great one. Shout out to Zach and Malik for making our experience top notch.

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We went there with a group of experienced escape room players and we all agreed that this place is by far one of our favorites. Very immersive, well thought out and loads of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Definitely the most professional escape room business in the city. I was impressed and will be back again!
